sentences.english: The building and boardwalks frame the rain gardens and broom sedge meadows.

sentences.english: We took a stroll on the boardwalk, enjoying the salty Atlantic breeze, and then had dinner by the shore.

sentences.english: Stilted walkways stood on baked earth and rowing boats lay stranded on the ground.

sentences.english: Then they walked hand in hand on the straight plank road on the beach delightedly .
